attributes.action: immediately reinstate the link of pensions with wages and pay to all qualifying pensioners or their heirs (if the Claimant has since died) the amounts due, backdated to the date that the government of the time broke the said link together with compound interest.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Pensioners have been having the value of their pensions eroded over the last 25 years since the government broke his link and linked the pension to prices which resulted in lower value pensions. 

Fairness demands this reinstatement.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/BasicPension/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
